title: If Aatrox was a pokemon..
body:
[](http://i143.photobucket.com/albums/r128/Varewulf/Blog%20stuff/LoL-Aatrox.jpg~original)
he would be a farfech'd
https://31.media.tumblr.com/5772099de49d97da237ac589952f4671/tumblr_inline_my4krukquN1qf5ex8.gif
Crazy Sword Skills, Isn't viable at all.

replies.body: Honestly I don't know which to feel worse for.
Aatrox probably because farfech'd didn't get metaphorically "gutted on the street and left to die" by a group of people who couldn't balance a see-saw if it was welded perfectly horizontal.

Nice analogy, it was quite humorous

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dbMeY7bU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-17T02:03:14.526+0000)
>
> Honestly I don't know which to feel worse for.

Probably Aatrox, considering he got gutted. Farfetch'd never got nerfed into the ground (RIP Dotrio ;-;)
Imagine if Farfeched had a real weapon.
I hate this but can't disagree. Riot please fix trox.
